doc.previous: Particularly noteworthy operations include the James Webb Space Telescope which will try to study the history of the universe and Aquarius will measure the water s salinity in order to better understand the global cycling of water 13
doc.after: Addressing Scientific Questions NASA s missions and therefore Goddard s missions address a broad range of scientific questions generally classified around four key areas Earth sciences astrophysics heliophysics and the solar system 14 To simplify Goddard studies Earth and Space 15
